Event.name: Dodging
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Dodger</fen> acts to avoid an oncoming moving <fen>Bad_entity</fen>. <ex><fex name="Dodger">Mo</fex> <t>dodged</t> <fex name="Bad_entity"> the flower pot that Larry threw in disgust</fex>.</ex>
The motion is relative, since the <fen>Dodger</fen> may be moving. <ex>Jogging through the dense woods, <fex name="Dodger">Mo</fex> <t>dodged</t> <fex name="Bad_entity">the low branches</fex> .</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Dodger
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Dodger</fen> acts to avoid an oncoming <fen>Bad_entity</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Dodger">Mo</fex> <t>dodged</t> the flower pot that Larry threw in disgust.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Bad_entity
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Bad_entity</fen> is the oncoming entity to avoid.
<ex>Mo <t>dodged</t> <fex name="Bad_entity"> the flower pot that Larry threw in disgust</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which the dodging occurs.
<ex>He <t>sidestepped</t> <fex name="Degree">just enough</fex> to soften the blow.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which the dodging occurs. </def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the dodging occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> at which the dodging occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Purpose</fen> for which the dodging occurs.
<ex>He <t>sidestepped</t> just enough <fex name="Purp">to soften the blow</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Explanation</fen> for which the dodging occurs. </def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which the dodging occurs.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: dodge.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: avoid by a sudden quick movement

lexUnit.name: sidestep.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the act of moving to one side in order to avoid an entity
